alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WEST CENTRAL PECOS, NORTHERN BREWSTER AND EAST CENTRAL JEFF DAVIS COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles southeast of Balmorhea Lake, or 29 miles northeast of Alpine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Pecos, northern Brewster and east central Jeff Davis Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
